name: geekpie-portfolio
description: GeekPie Portfolio - Static website with MERN admin dashboard

scripts.install:all: npm run install:server && npm run install:client
scripts.copy-admin: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const src='mern-app/client/build';const dest='admin';if(fs.existsSync(src)){if(fs.existsSync(dest))fs.rmSync(dest,{recursive:true});fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});fs.cpSync(src,dest,{recursive:true});console.log('Admin build copied to admin/');}else{console.log('Client build not found');}"
scripts.build: npm run install:client && npm run build:client && npm run copy-admin

author: GeekPie
